name: ultimate-media-server
description: A docker collection of services needed to make the best automated media server in existence with the least amount of effort.

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && npm run clean:dusting && rm -rf configs/
scripts.clean:dusting: npm run docker:reset && rm -rf temp/plex/ temp/incomplete/ docker-compose.yml npm-debug.log
scripts.docker: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:start
scripts.docker:reset: [ -f docker-compose.yml ] && npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:remove || echo "No docker-compose.yml found"
scripts.hosts: sudo hostile set $(docker-machine ip default) mediaserver

author: Nate Clark
